nedit ../gcc_specfun/libstdc++-v3/include/bits/sf_bessel.tcc

./fetch_std.sh 
./update_local.sh 
./install_std.sh 
touch origin_*.cc pr56216_cyl_*.cc
make testcases
make check


Removing too-big files:

git filter-branch -f --index-filter 'git rm --cached --ignore-unmatch test_cyl_hankel.txt' HEAD~5..HEAD
git filter-branch -f --index-filter 'git rm --cached --ignore-unmatch test_sph_hankel.txt' HEAD~5..HEAD
git filter-branch -f --index-filter 'git rm --cached --ignore-unmatch test_beta.txt' HEAD~5..HEAD


Removing unstaged changes..
that might prevent filtering...
-----------------------------------
git clean -df
Will just destroy shit

git stash save --keep-index
Will stash stuff
